entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-03-20
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Source Generator is not reloaded since SDK 7.0.200 - .NET Host cache issue? #67388
  • Exception in user supplied comparer causes the generator driver to crash #67386
    17.6
  • LSIF generator should have a stable, well-defined set of consumer + customer-facing requirements #67385
  • LSIF generator fails to start because it cannot find the .NET SDK - Near term fix #67383
  • "Implement all members explicitly" adds wrong namespace alias #67374
  • IDE showed an error message saying Semantic Classification Service had crashed #67373
  • Stop silently adding 'using' directives when no auto-completion has been requested #67372
  • Ref-assigning a ref parameter to a ref field with primary constructor #67371
  • [nullable check]'from clause' should have nullable check in query expression #67370

Closed

  • TFM trimming, and elimination of net4* targeting in Linux source-build #63746
    Backlog
  • Remove InlineHintsOptions.DisplayAllOverride #57283
    17.6 P2

PullRequests

Created

  • Add test #67387
    Area-IDE
  • Trim away netframework targets in source-build #67384
    Area-Infrastructure, Community
  • Add NuGet SourceMapping #67382
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Fix 17.5 CI build #67381
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Reduce allocations in diagnostic analyzer management system. #67376
    Area-IDE

Merged

  • Do not capture project/solution/compilation data in designer-attribute-scanning. #67369
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Change CheckBoxOptionViewModel to AbstractCheckBoxViewModel #67379
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Trim away netframework targets in source-build #67355
    Area-Infrastructure, Community, Next
  • revert nuget feed changes #67378
    Area-Infrastructure, Next
  • Add new package to PublishData #67375
    Area-Infrastructure, Next
  • Update codeowner for O# ExternalAccess #67377
    Area-Infrastructure, Next
  • Move off of options for encoding ephemeral state in inline-hints #67367
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Make Document Outline computation and update asynchronous. #65641
    Area-IDE, Next

Updated

  • Fix up local/non-local diagnostic classification in analyzer driver #67275
    Area-IDE, Area-Analyzers
  • Code changes to allow 'using static unsafe' #67344
    Area-Compilers
  • Implement LSP inlay hints #67319
    Area-IDE
  • Clarify diagnostic when constant pattern has non-constant conversion to input type #64741
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Remove unused state form TypeofBinder and GetTypeBinder. #67343
    Area-Compilers
  • Hook up DidChangeConfiguration from client #66861
    Area-IDE
  • Merge latest bits from `main` into `roles` feature branch and resolve conflicts around primary constructors #67362
    Area-Compilers
  • Generate branchless IL for `(b ? 1 : 0)` #67191
    Area-Compilers
  • Update AbstractEditorFactory to implement IVsEditorFactoryChooser #67358
    Area-IDE
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 327: Build ID 2139752 #67361
  • List patterns: Add initial support for enumerables #66553
    Area-Compilers, Community, C# 12.0
  • Allow missing placeholders and locals in RefSafetyAnalysis visitor #67092
    Area-Compilers, Blocked, Pending director approval, servicing-consider, 17.5
  • Port 66085 to 17.5 for servicing #67300
    Area-Analyzers, Needs Shiproom Approval, servicing-consider
  • Exclude non-local diagnostics by default in legacy test framework for analyzer/code fix unit tests #67351
    Area-IDE
  • Collection literals natural type #67364
  • Experimenting with compiler logs #67349
    Area-Infrastructure, Blocked
